projects.title: Study Buddy
projects.description: Through our team‚Äôs survey, many students struggle with time management, finding it difficult to balance their studies with other responsibilities. To address this, we decided to create a study tracking app to help students log study hours and manage their time effectively. Study buddy is a mobile-friendly web app that provides tools to record study time and personalized insights based on performance.

projects.title: Slack Message Archive
projects.description: When I was working at Cube Design and Communication, my team used Slack to communicate. One day, I tried to find a message to troubleshoot an issue, but I couldn‚Äôt because we were on Slack‚Äôs Free Plan, which limits access to messages older than 90 days. This experience inspired me to create this app. Slack Message Archive is a web-based app that automatically stores messages and provides permanent access to them.

projects.title: Language Exchange
projects.description:
As an ESL speaker myself, I remembered how hard it was to find friends who spoke the language I wanted to practice. That's when I thought of creating an app that would help students connect with native speakers of the language they want to learn. 
 After I finished a coding bootcamp, I felt like I didn't have enough skill in backend development. To fix this, I spent time learning ASP.NET. While doing so, I learned many things, like how to use the CQRS pattern and how to add real-time chatting with SignalR. 
 Since I had just picked up new backend skills, I decided to combine my idea with what I had learned. That's how I ended up building my language exchange app.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.description: Twitter Clone is a full-stack project featuring CRUD operations for posts and comments, retweets, follow/unfollow functionality, like/unlike posts, infinite scrolling, and image uploads to AWS S3.

projects.title: Education dashboard
projects.description: Led a frontend team of 4 to develop a user role-based education system (admin, teacher, and student) with CRUD operations, allowing admin to register new students, teachers, and courses.
